name: Project D.I.G.I.
description:
I have been tried develop an old game name of Project I.G.I.  You have to sneak into the base and destroy the shelter. Before that you must find c4 in base to destroy. After you found the bomb go to shelter and plant bomb. But you need to protect yourself from soldiers. You can press Left Shift to protect your self. It benefits you invisibility. 

Controller: 

WASD

LSHIFT - to protect your self 

1 and 2 to switch between guns.    

CREDIT : Sounds from  Orhan (dincsahinorhan@gmail.com)
